metadata.description: The Azure Active Directory Tenant ID
The 3 character Azure prefix for the customer for all resources
The customers overload IP address to whitelist for access
The location for all existing and new resources
Set to 'true' to use existing Virtual Network
Set to 'true' to use existing Virtual Network resource group
If 'useExistingVnetResourceGroup' is true specify the name of the resource group to deploy the virtual network into
If 'existingVnet' is false specify the address space to use for the virtual network
If 'existingVnet' is false specify the address space to use for the application/internal server subnet
If 'existingVnet' is false specify the address space to use for the DMZ server subnet
If 'existingVnet' is true specify the name of the virtual network
If 'existingVnet' is true specify the name of the existing internal subnet
If 'existingVnet' is true specify the name of the existing DMZ subnet
Set to 'true' to use existing Network Security Groups
If 'existingNSG' is true specify the name of the existing internal network security group
If 'existingNSG' is true specify the name of the existing DMZ network security group
The name of the Private DNS Zone that either already exists or is to be created
Set to 'true' to use an existing storage account
If 'useExistingStorageAccount' is true specify the name of the storage account
The URL of the blob storage that holds the Mitel image files
The SAS token allowing access to the blob storage that holds the Mitel image files
Choose the timezone for the MSL machines
The MSL initial password. Minimum length of 8 characters with alphanumeric characters only
A comma-delimited list of remote networks wrapped with "" allowed to access the servers (eg. "1.2.3.4/32", "5.6.7.8/32")

Password for the Virtual Machine. Password must have 3 of the following: 1 lower case character, 1 upper case character, 1 number, and 1 special character. The value must be between 12 and 72 characters long.
Set to 'true' to deploy a MiVoice Business server
Specify the version of MiVoice Business to deploy
Choose the size of the MiVB to deploy
Set to 'true' to deploy a MiCollab server
Specify the version of MiCollab to deploy
Choose the size of the MiCollab to deploy
Set to 'true' to deploy a MiContact Centre server
The Windows Server version for the VM. This will pick the latest Gen2 image of this given Windows version.
Choose MiCC system size.
Set to 'true' to deploy a SQL server
The Windows Server version for the VM. This will pick the latest Gen2 image of this given Windows version.
Choose SQL system size.
Set to 'true' to deploy an IVR server
The Windows Server version for the VM. This will pick the latest Gen2 image of this given Windows version.
Set to 'true' to deploy a MiVCR server
The Windows Server version for the VM. This will pick the latest Gen2 image of this given Windows version.
Choose MiVCR system size.
Set to 'true' to deploy an MBG server in the DMZ to be used for Teleworker
Specify the version of MBG to deploy
Choose the size of the Teleworker MBG to deploy
Set to 'true' to deploy an MBG server in the DMZ to be used for SIP Trunks/SRC
Specify the version of MBG to deploy
Choose the size of the SIP Trunk/SRC MBG to deploy
